name: NuAgri Inc.
tag_list: cleantech, agricultural-technology, technology, locavorism, urban-farming, light-cell, aeroponics, sustainability, energy-efficient, etfe, green, environmental
overview:
NuAgri Inc. is an agri-tech consulting firm dedicated to staying at the forefront of new technology for the betterment of our clients.

NuAgri’s patent pending systems include closed system biodome greenhouses using etfe pneumatic pillows, micropropagation (or in vitro plant tissue culture) methods, programmable spectrum light fixtures, and vertical farming cabinets.

NuAgri’s systems allow for operations (large and small) to remain more localized, more profitable, and to offer a better product (freshness, shelf-life).

milestones.description: NuAgri qualifies for EBC program under BC's Ministry of Jobs, Tourism and Innovation. The EBC programs allows BC residents and companies investing in up and coming BC companies like NuAgri to receive 30% tax credits up to $60,000 on their private investme
milestones.source_description: BC Investors In Nuagri, Inc. Eligible To Receive A Refundable Tax Credit Equal To 30% Of Their Investment Amount

milestones.description: NuAgri is among the top companies at the leading edge of agricultural cleantech, according to Kachan & Co.'s latest report. Kachan forecasts increased venture investment in sustainable agriculture, based rising food costs.
milestones.source_description: NuAgri at 'Leading Edge' of Sustainable Agriculture (Environmental Leader)
